name: basement
longDescription: You're in the Basement. The cement floor and brick walls bounce every small sound back at you. An eerie howl echoes from outside. The door to the Lower Hall is to the west. There's a bin against one side of the room, along with a pile of cans.
shortDescription: You're in the Basement. The Lower Hall is to the west. There's a bin against one side of the room, along with a pile of cans.

canPile.0: All of the cans look empty except one. They have no labels.
canPile.1: All of the cans look empty. They have no labels.

Examine.bin: It's a trash can full of empty tin cans.
Examine.canPile: It's a pile of cans. It smells... unpleasant.
Examine.walls: The walls are made of big brick blocks.
Examine.ceiling: The ceiling is low. If you were just a little taller, you might hit your head.

Listen.howl: You hear an unearthly howling sound from outside.
